name: PanChira Concentration
description:
Note: All characters appearing in this game are over the age of 18.

Concentration, also known as Match Match, Match Up, Memory, Pelmanism, Shinkei-suijaku, Pexeso or simply Pairs, is a card game in which all of the cards are laid face down on a surface and two cards are flipped face up over each turn. The object of the game is to turn over pairs of matching cards.
All cards in this game include various types of Panchira (a brief glimpse of a woman's underwear).

Turn over pairs of matching the same type of pantsu and compete on the speed of complete!



This game contains "Global Score", that is an unique competing rank system.
The more players buy, the higher it reaches.
Join this eternally heated ranking battle!

Features:

- Card Game

- Simple mouse control

- Nice graphics

- Beautiful girls

- Pantsu
